description: The library status has changed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DELL-TL4000-MIB::eventStatusChange DELL-TL4000-MIB::libraryProductId s EXAMPLE DELL-TL4000-MIB::librarySerNum s EXAMPLE DELL-TL4000-MIB::tl4000StatusLastGlobalStatus i 1 DELL-TL4000-MIB::tl4000StatusGlobalStatus i 1

description: Library Product Id string as reported in a SCSI Inquiry command.
variables.name: DELL-TL4000-MIB::libraryProductId

description: Library serial number as reported in SCSI Inquiry command, page 0x80.
variables.name: DELL-TL4000-MIB::librarySerNum

description: The status before the current status which induced an initiative
to issue a global status change trap.
variables.name: DELL-TL4000-MIB::tl4000StatusLastGlobalStatus

description: Current status of the product.
This is a rollup for the entire agent including any
monitored devices. The status is intended to give
initiative to a snmp monitor to get further data when
this status is abnormal.
variables.name: DELL-TL4000-MIB::tl4000StatusGlobalStatus

description: The library door has been opened.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DELL-TL4000-MIB::eventDoorOpen DELL-TL4000-MIB::libraryProductId s EXAMPLE DELL-TL4000-MIB::librarySerNum s EXAMPLE

data reliability.
